name: BioSys Inc (itch)
description:
Biosys Inc is a company that will invite you to a lifeless planet and create the first cells as you watch them evolve and populate the planet with Fungi, Plantae and Animalia.

Change the dna to populate the planet with your creations.

BioSys Inc is in development and we need your help to keep going. Join our Patreon page at https://www.patreon.com/mpgamestudios

We would also love to hear more suggestions and ideas to improve the game.
